lyric:
[00:00.000] 作词 : Jon Steingard
[00:00.000] 作曲 : Jon Steingard
[00:00.00]
[00:16.080]I ain't like no one you met before
[00:19.920]I'm running for the front
[00:21.320]When they're all running for the door
[00:23.650]And I won't sit down won't back out
[00:25.990]You can't ever shut me up
[00:27.990]Cause I'm on a mission
[00:30.010]And I won't quit now
[00:31.790]In a world full of followers
[00:33.490]I'll be a leader
[00:35.530]In a world full of doubters
[00:37.420]I'll be a believer
[00:40.530]I'm stepping out without a hesitation
[00:44.030]Because the battle's already been won
[00:47.640]I'm sold out
[00:49.820]I'm no longer living
[00:51.920]Just for myself
[00:53.910]Running after Jesus
[00:55.540]With my whole heart
[00:58.040]And now I'm ready to show
[01:00.990]I am sold out
[01:03.929]I'm sold out
[01:05.870]With every single
[01:07.489]Step that I take now
[01:09.700]With every drop of blood
[01:11.110]Left in my veins
[01:12.790]I'm gonna be making it count
[01:17.099]I am sold out
[01:20.319]This ain't just some temporary phase
[01:23.980]You can't face this kind of grace
[01:26.400]And leave the way you came
[01:28.159]This is permanent with intent
[01:30.489]And there won't be no stopping it now
[01:31.920]I'm on a mission and it's heaven sent
[01:35.769]In a world full of followers
[01:37.709]I'll be a leader
[01:39.500]In a world full of doubters
[01:41.349]I'll be a believer
[01:44.040]I'm stepping out without a hesitation
[01:48.110]Cause my soul is like a stadium
[01:51.800]I'm sold out
[01:53.760]I'm no longer living
[01:55.950]Just for myself
[01:58.030]Running after Jesus
[02:00.019]With my whole heart
[02:02.219]And now I'm ready to show
[02:04.939]I am sold out
[02:07.939]I'm sold out
[02:09.919]With every single
[02:11.580]Step that I take now
[02:13.719]With every drop of blood
[02:15.039]Left in my veins
[02:18.110]I'm gonna be making it count
[02:21.199]I am sold out
[02:25.460]No trials coming against me
[02:29.479]Could put a dent in my passion
[02:33.310]They're just an opportunity
[02:37.370]To put my faith into action
[02:40.020]In a world full of followers
[02:41.599]I'll be a leader
[02:43.620]In a world full of doubters
[02:45.509]I'll be a believer
[02:48.520]I'm stepping out without a hesitation
[02:52.379]I ain't got nothing left to be afraid of
[02:55.699]I'm sold out
[02:57.800]I'm no longer living
[02:59.500]Just for myself
[03:01.750]Running after Jesus
[03:03.719]With my whole heart
[03:06.050]And now I'm ready to show
[03:08.900]I am sold out
[03:11.919]I'm sold out
[03:14.090]With every single
[03:15.490]Step that I take now
[03:17.879]With every drop of blood
[03:19.530]Left in my veins
[03:21.479]I'm gonna be making it count
[03:25.020]I am sold out
